panchayat.name: Devnagar
panchayat.about:
Devnagar is a progressive Gram Panchayat focused on clean water, paved roads, education, and e‑governance. Our mission is to deliver essential services transparently and to engage residents through digital platforms.

देवनगर ग्राम पंचायत स्वच्छ जल, पक्की सड़कें, शिक्षा और ई‑गवर्नेंस पर केंद्रित है। हमारा उद्देश्य पारदर्शिता के साथ सेवाएं देना और डिजिटल माध्यम से नागरिकों की भागीदारी सुनिश्चित करना है।

news.title: Ward-wise Road Repair Tender Published
news.excerpt: Inviting bids for patchwork and side-drain cleaning across 8 wards.

news.title: Health Camp on Sunday
news.excerpt: Free general check-up, vaccination awareness and blood group testing at Community Hall.

contact.address: Gram Panchayat Office, Devnagar, Tehsil — Ajmer, Rajasthan 305001
